MAIN_MESSAGE: We apologise that today's pre arranged work affecting your property in the G82 postcode area of Dumbarton is still ongoing. This is due to snow and poor weather conditions and we now expect power to be back on by 3:30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:18 PM on Wednesday, 03 February 2021.
